mapper.select: select airCode, company, startDrome, arriveDrome, startTime, arriveTime, mode, airStop, week from ticket;
select airCode, company, startDrome, arriveDrome, startTime, arriveTime, mode, airStop, week from ticket where airCode=#{airCode}
mapper.insert: insert into ticket(airCode, company, startDrome, arriveDrome, startTime, arriveTime, mode, airStop, week) values ( #{airCode}, #{company}, #{startDrome}, #{arriveDrome}, #{startTime}, #{arriveTime}, #{mode}, #{irStop}, #{week});
